BattleCommands

Class DefensiveAbility

  • java.lang.Object
    • BattleCommands.BattleCommand
      • BattleCommands.Ability
        • BattleCommands.DefensiveAbility
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PaladinAbility.Defend, PaladinAbility.Heal, SoldierAbility.Defend

    public abstract class DefensiveAbility
extends Ability
    DefensiveAbility is an abstract class that extends Ability. It provides an outline and constructor for all DefensiveAbilities. Why abstract? We don't yet know exactly what an ability will do or what class the ability belongs to.
    Author:
    Kevin

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefensiveAbility

        public DefensiveAbility(int pointCost,
                        java.lang.String statAffected,
                        int effectStrength)
        Constructor to set the defensive abilities point cost, which stat is effects and it's effect strength.
        Parameters:
        pointCost: - how many abilities point will be consumed on use
        statAffected: - which of the hero's statistics is affected
        effectStrength: - how strong of an effect does this ability have

      • useBattleCommand

        public abstract void useBattleCommand(Hero hero,
                                      Hero other)
                               throws MaximumStatException
        Use the current ability. Don't know exactly what the ability does yet thus the method is abstract. Throws MaximumStatException if the defensive ability or item used cannot increase the statistic that it affects.
        Specified by:
        useBattleCommand in class Ability
        Parameters:
        hero: - current acting hero
        target: - target hero
        Throws:
        MaximumStatException - if the defensive ability or item used cannot increase the statistic that it affects.

      • setStatAffected

        public void setStatAffected(java.lang.String statAffected)

        Parameters:
        statAffected: - the name of the statistic that this ability will affect.
